description: Are you struggling trying to figure out how to improve your productivity? Do you have a good handle on the C# language, but still feel like it takes you forever to write code? Well, no more. Enter ReSharper by Jetbrains. ReSharper is a fantastic extension for Visual Studio that will help you to increase your productivity and decrease your development time. This course will teach you how to set up a perfect workflow in ReSharper.Â
title: Perfect Workflow in ReSharper
